name: All-in-One Sidebar (AIOS) Autohide - Click Appear
description:
The AIOS sidebar appears when the far left of screen is clicked. It hides when the mouse is moved away from the AIOS sidebar.

Requires: All-in-One Sidebar
https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/all-in-one-sidebar/
author: lawrenceting

name: Bookmark / Bookmarks Toolbar Autohide with Hover
description: The bookmarks toolbar appears when mouse hovers on awesome bar. It hides when mouse is moved away.
author: lawrenceting
